headline.main: The Early Word: Trials of Detainees

byline.original: By KATE PHILLIPS and JANIE LORBER

docs.abstract: The Obama administration is spending a lot of time revisiting Bush policies these days, but then again, so is Congress.
docs.lead_paragraph: The White House plans to announce on Friday its intentions to maintain a system of military commission trials to prosecute terrorist suspects, one that would remain similar to that designed by the Bush administration.
docs.snippet: The Obama administration is spending a lot of time revisiting Bush policies these days, but then again, so is Congress.
